narrative_functions.name: Setting Introduction
narrative_functions.description: Establishes location, mood, tone to ground the reader in the story world.

narrative_functions.name: Character Introduction
narrative_functions.description: Introduces key characters with their motivations, personalities, and relationships.

narrative_functions.name: Inciting Incident
narrative_functions.description: First major disruption to the status quo that sets the story in motion.

narrative_functions.name: First Reversal
narrative_functions.description: Unexpected shift in direction or stakes that changes the trajectory.

narrative_functions.name: Rising Tension
narrative_functions.description: Builds suspense, stakes, and pressure toward the climax.

narrative_functions.name: Subplot Activation
narrative_functions.description: Launches secondary narrative threads that enrich the main plot.

narrative_functions.name: Moral Challenge
narrative_functions.description: Characters face ethical or emotional conflict that tests their values.

narrative_functions.name: Midpoint Turn
narrative_functions.description: Major twist or truth that changes the trajectory of the story.

narrative_functions.name: Relationship Reversal
narrative_functions.description: Shift in character dynamics such as betrayal or unexpected alliance.

narrative_functions.name: Moment of Weakness
narrative_functions.description: Hero falters emotionally or physically, showing vulnerability.

narrative_functions.name: Setback
narrative_functions.description: External failure or complication that forces characters to adapt.

narrative_functions.name: Truth Revelation
narrative_functions.description: Important secret or mystery is unveiled, changing everything.

narrative_functions.name: Confrontation
narrative_functions.description: Major clash between protagonist and antagonist, often physical or verbal.

narrative_functions.name: Climax
narrative_functions.description: Emotional or physical peak of tension where the central conflict reaches its height.

narrative_functions.name: Transformation
narrative_functions.description: Character undergoes internal shift or rebirth, showing growth.

narrative_functions.name: Denouement
narrative_functions.description: Loose ends are resolved and consequences of the climax are shown.

narrative_functions.name: Final Image
narrative_functions.description: Last scene or symbolic moment that provides closure or reflection.

narrative_functions.name: Foreshadowing
narrative_functions.description: Seeds planted for future tension or events to come.

narrative_functions.name: Echo
narrative_functions.description: Payoff for earlier scene or dialogue, creating narrative resonance.

narrative_functions.name: Reflection
narrative_functions.description: Characters contemplate past actions and their implications for change.

narrative_functions.name: Theme Reinforcement
narrative_functions.description: Underscores core message or motif of the story.

narrative_functions.name: Catalyst Event
narrative_functions.description: Minor event with disproportionate future impact on the story.

narrative_functions.name: Unexpected Reunion
narrative_functions.description: Characters reconnect in surprising ways that affect the plot.
